long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Restaurant Website Link Collector is a helpful tool designed for restaurant owners to collect important website links for their business. Whether it's the latest menu, upcoming events, or special promotions, this extension allows you to easily gather and organize these links for your restaurant's email marketing campaigns.

How it works:

Collection: Easily collect website links related to your restaurant's menu, events, promotions, and more while browsing the web.
Organization: The collected links are organized and stored within the extension, making it convenient to access them later.
Integration: Links can be uploaded directly to your selected Google Sheets, allowing you to share them with your marketing team or agents for further use.
Efficiency: Save time and streamline your marketing efforts by having all the important website links in one central location.
Key Features:

Simple and intuitive interface for collecting website links.
Direct integration with Google Sheets for easy sharing and collaboration.
Customizable to fit your restaurant's specific needs and preferences.
Helps streamline email marketing efforts and enhances communication with your marketing team or agents.
Benefits:

Boosts the effectiveness of your restaurant's email marketing campaigns by providing relevant and up-to-date website links.
Centralizes and organizes important links, making them readily accessible whenever needed.
Facilitates collaboration and coordination with your marketing team or agents by sharing collected links directly to Google Sheets.
